name: Construct-O-Car
description:
CONSTRUCT-O-CAR

+++ NEEDS TO BE FULL-SCREENED (button in the bottom-right corner by" LD40")+++

- Use A/D to steer
- Collect yellow balls for points
- Avoid dark obstacles

- Build your car by collecting car parts
- Every car part adds to your points multiplier
- BUT...they also make the car more complex to manage!
